column4: unfortunately stick it out for a while or reinstall if you check ubuntuforums there should be a guide for putting your /home on sep partition then you can reinstall and just point /home to existing space
Thanks for the tip (a half hour ago :P). I can chroot to it from the LiveCD to work and/or backup what I need to. I think I'll stick it out.
your braver than me im still in dapper :)
Nah not brave. Just blessed with an extra machine to play with. It's made for things like this. ;)
